ok guys I have a solution for those having trouble with cs5.5 

Plugins not appearing after installed...so far for me particular and shine all worked just fine *but* it got installed in a different partition (E: instead of C..program files etc) all I did was move the files to the right folder (plugins in afx folder)  So If you have problems with the plugins not showing just do a search for them and after you findthem elsewhere, copy them to your plugins folder.

Form issue: I also got the "path is empty" crap...to fix this you have to download form 2.0 or 2.0.1 from trapcode's page (apparently they messed up their install files and they are glitchy on cs 5.5) after you download it don't try the old serials as they are for FORM 1.1  try instead this one: 85128940200057334577

I'll see if the other ones work cheers and thanx DARKMAN for this fine release

for all those having a problem installing for cs5.5 (i've only tried particular), all you need to do is select custom install instead of complete install from the installer. Then select the afx cs5.5 plugins/effects directory and hit install.
